ruleBookInfo.intro:
leave = java.getString("table[height]@font@html"); leave = leave==""?"":leave+"
‎"; contenttag = String(java.getString(".smallreadbody@a[style][href][target]@text")).replace(/^(?=\S)|\n/g,"🏷️"); viewpoint = String(java.getString("ul.rightul[name='printright']@li.1@text")).replace(/\s|作品视角：$/g,""); info1 = java.getString("span.bluetext.0@text"); protagonist = info1.match(/(主角：.*)\s┃\s配角/)[1]; costar = info1.match(/(配角：.*)\s┃\s其它/)[1]; other = info1.match(/(其它：.*)/)[1]; protagonist = protagonist.replace(/主角：$/,""); costar = costar.replace(/配角：$/,""); other = other.replace(/其它：$/,""); info = protagonist+'\n'+costar+'\n'+other; intro1 = java.getString(".smallreadbody@span[style='color:#F98C4D']@text"); novelIntroShort = intro1.match(/(一句话简介：.*)\n立意：/)[1]; littleintro = intro1.match(/(立意：.*)/)[1]; novelIntroShort = novelIntroShort.replace(/一句话简介：$/,""); littleintro = littleintro.replace(/立意：$/,""); intro = novelIntroShort+'\n'+littleintro; reviewCount = java.getString("span[itemprop='reviewCount']@text"); reviewCount = "总书评数："+reviewCount; collectedCount = java.getString("span[itemprop='collectedCount']@text"); collectedCount = "当前被收藏数："+collectedCount; novelintro = java.getString("#novelintro@html"); novelid = baseUrl.match(/novelid.(\d+)/)[1]; commentListurl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?versionCode=290&novelId="+novelid+"&limit=5"; A = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentListurl)); if(A.code=="200") { commentTotal = A.data.commentTotal; if(commentTotal=="0") { top = "" } else { is_top = A.data.commentList[0].is_top; commentAuthor = A.data.commentList[0].commentAuthor; commentBody = A.data.commentList[0].commentBody; ip_pos = A.data.commentList[0].ip_pos; commentDate = A.data.commentList[0].commentDate; toppedcomment = commentAuthor+"　"+commentDate+"　"+"来自"+ip_pos+"　[置顶]"+"\n"+commentBody+"
‎"; top = is_top=="1"?toppedcomment:"" } } else { top = "" }; OtherInfoUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/androidapi/getnovelOtherInfo,"; OtherInfoUrloption = { "method": "POST", "body": "novelId="+novelid }; OtherInfoUrl = OtherInfoUrl+JSON.stringify(OtherInfoUrloption); B = JSON.parse(java.ajax(OtherInfoUrl)); novelreview = B.novelreview; novelreview = novelreview.match(/\d分/)?"评分："+novelreview:""; contentinfo = leave+"\n"+top+"\n"+contenttag+"\n"+viewpoint+"\n"+info+"\n"+intro+"\n"+reviewCount+"\n"+collectedCount+"\n"+novelreview; "\t"+contentinfo+"\n‎\n"+novelintro

} else { VIPurl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/androidapi/androidChapterBatchDownload,"; Text = "versionCode=290&novelId="+novelid+"&chapterIds="+chapterid+"&token="+Userid+key; option = { "method": "POST", "body": Text }; VIPurl = VIPurl+JSON.stringify(option); Html = java.ajax(VIPurl); java.setContent(Html); status = java.getString("$..status"); content = java.getString("$..content"); content = status=="success"?java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KW8Dvm2N"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content):""; saybody = java.getString("$..sayBody"); message = java.getString("$..message"); }; chapterintro = java.get("chapterintro"); pointMeassge = java.get("pointmeassge"); content1 = "\t"+chapterintro+"\n"+message; content1 = pointMeassge=="0晋江币"?content1:content1+"\n"+"价格："+pointMeassge+"（APP专享价）"; saybody = saybody!=""?"\n"+"▍作者有话说："+saybody:""; saybody = /关闭作话/.test(extend)?"":saybody; Content = content==""?content1:content+saybody; //评论区 commentnum = String(extend).replace(/\D+/g,""); limit = commentnum==""?"5":commentnum; if(isvip=="0") { commentUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?versionCode=290&novelId="+novelid+"&limit="+limit+"&offset=0&commentSort=0&chapterId="+chapterid } else { commentUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?versionCode=290&novelId="+novelid+"&limit="+limit+"&offset=0&commentSort=0&token="+Userid+key+"&chapterId="+chapterid }; Comment = /评论/.test(extend)?JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)):""; Commentcode = Comment.code; if(Commentcode=="200") { commentList = Comment.data.commentList; if(commentList.length=="0") { Commentcontent = "" } else { Commentcontent = ""; for(i=0; i‎\n"+"▍评论："+"\n"+Commentcontent; Content+Commentcontent

	islock = chaptername==""?islock:" "+islock;

	} else {

	}

bookSourceComment:
在“设置书籍变量”时填1，将开启webview（默认关闭）
“登录后”看不了已购买的VIP章节→开启webview→刷新目录→刷新正文→可看已购买的VIP章节
webview仅针对填写了书籍变量的书，其他书想要开启webview需再次填写

ruleContent.content:
<js>
siteName = java.get("sitename");
bookPage = java.get("bookpage");
phonePage = java.get("phonepage");
comment = JSON.parse(result);
commentlist = comment.data.comments;
commentcontent = "";
for(i=0; i<commentlist.length; i++) {
	let A = commentlist[i];
	let content = A.content;
	let updateAt = A.updateAt.replace(/[.]\d{3}Z/,"").replace(/T/," ");
	let score = A.score;
	let userName = A.createrId.userName
	let praiseCount = A.praiseCount
	commentcontent+="•——————•——————•"+"\n"+"👤"+userName+"　"+"编辑于"+updateAt+"　"+"🌸".repeat(score)+"\n"+content+"\n"+"👍"+"【"+praiseCount+"】"+"\n"
	}
"\t"+"【"+siteName+"】"+"\n"+"【"+bookPage+"】"+"\n"+"【"+phonePage+"】"+"\n"+commentcontent
</js>

		})	
	}
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
id = baseUrl.match(/\d+/);
url = "https://www.doufuyuedu.com/novel/getChapter/"+id;
cookie = cookie.getCookie(url);
token = String(cookie).replace(/XSRF\-TOKEN=|;.*/g,"");
option = {
	"method": "POST",
	"headers": {
		"accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*",
		"accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate, br",
		"accept-language": "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,zh-TW;q=0.8",
		"referer": baseUrl,
		"Cookie": cookie,
		"x-csrf-token": token
		}
	};
java.ajax(url+","+JSON.stringify(option))
</js>
$.content
